name: Instant Demo Booker for High Intent Leads

parameters.content:
## Instant Demo Booker for High-Intent Leads

### How it works  
- **Lead Capture**: Collects form submissions via webhook (e.g., email, name, company).  
- **Data Enrichment**: Uses Clearbit to enrich lead data (company size, revenue, industry, etc.).  
- **Fit Scoring**: Calculates a fit score based on company size, revenue, and job title (0‚Äì100).  
- **Lead Routing**: 
   - **High-Intent Leads (score ‚â• 60)**: Routed to a fast track for immediate action.  
   - **Standard Leads (score < 60)**: Routed for standard follow-up.  
- **Demo Scheduling**: Fetches available demo slots from Calendly and sends them to sales team in Slack.  
- **Sales Alerts**: Sends Slack notifications to sales with lead details and available demo slots.  
- **Follow-Up**: If no response from sales within 10 minutes, an automatic email is sent to the lead.  
- **Logging**: Logs all data to Google Sheets for analytics and tracking.


### Setup Requirements  
1. **Clearbit**: API key for lead enrichment.  
2. **HubSpot**: App token for CRM integration (create/update contacts & deals).  
3. **Calendly**: OAuth2 token & user URI for demo scheduling.  
4. **Slack**: Bot token for channel notifications, configure channels for hot leads & standard leads.  
5. **SendGrid**: API key for sending fallback emails.  
6. **Google Sheets**: OAuth2 connection and sheet ID for lead & demo logs.


### Customize
‚Ä¢ Fit score logic (Calculate Fit Score node)
‚Ä¢ Slack channel names
‚Ä¢ Email template
‚Ä¢ Calendar event name filter

## Standard Path (Score <60)
Posts to #leads Slack channel
No automated follow-up
Standard nurture workflow

nodes.name: Lead Form Webhook
nodes.notes: Receives lead submissions via POST request

nodes.name: Normalize Lead Data
nodes.notes: Standardizes field names from different form providers

nodes.name: Enrich with Clearbit
nodes.notes: Enriches contact with company data (size, revenue, industry, job title)

nodes.name: Calculate Fit Score
nodes.notes: Scores 0-100 based on company size (40), seniority (30), revenue (30)

nodes.name: High Intent Lead?
nodes.notes: Routes leads with score ‚â•60 to fast track, others to standard

nodes.name: Create HubSpot Contact
nodes.notes: Creates or updates contact in HubSpot CRM

nodes.name: Get Calendly Event Types
nodes.notes: Fetches your Calendly event types to find Demo events

nodes.name: Prepare Availability Params
nodes.notes: Finds Demo event and prepares 7-day availability window

nodes.name: Get Available Demo Slots
nodes.notes: Fetches real available time slots from Calendly API

nodes.name: Format Demo Slots
nodes.notes: Formats next 2 available slots with booking URLs

nodes.name: Alert Sales (High Intent)
nodes.notes: Posts to #hot-leads with full lead details and booking links

nodes.name: Alert Sales (Standard)
nodes.notes: Posts to #leads channel for standard priority

nodes.name: Wait 10 Minutes
nodes.notes: Waits for sales rep to respond in Slack thread

nodes.name: Check Slack Replies
nodes.notes: Checks if sales team replied in thread

nodes.name: No Response?
nodes.notes: Sends email if no Slack reply (message count = 1)

nodes.name: Send Fallback Email
nodes.notes: Auto-sends booking email if sales doesn't respond

parameters.subject: =Book Your Demo - {{ $('Calculate Fit Score').first().json.enrichedCompany }}
parameters.contentValue:
=

Thanks for your interest!

Hi {{ $('Normalize Lead Data').first().json.fullName }},

We received your demo request for {{ $('Calculate Fit Score').first().json.enrichedCompany }}.

Next available:

  • {{ $('Format Demo Slots').first().json.nextSlots[0] }}
  • {{ $('Format Demo Slots').first().json.nextSlots[1] }}

Book Demo Now

Looking forward to connecting!

nodes.name: Log to Google Sheets
nodes.notes: Logs all lead data for analytics and reporting

nodes.name: Webhook Response
nodes.notes: Returns success message to form with booking details

parameters.responseBody: ={"success":true,"message":"Demo request received!","fitScore":{{$('Calculate Fit Score').item.json.fitScore}},"priority":"{{$('Calculate Fit Score').item.json.fitScore>=60?'high':'standard'}}","availableSlots":{{$('Format Demo Slots').item.json.slotCount}},"bookingUrl":"{{$('Format Demo Slots').item.json.bookingUrl}}"}

parameters.content: ## Log to Google Sheet and Send Response
## Wait 10 minutes, Check for response. Send email if no reply
## Enrich the Lead data and calculate the Fit Score
